oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Union veteran Pleasant Carroll Grayson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Grayson was from Shirleytown in Marion County, TN and served in Co. I, 10th Tenn. Inf. USA. He was mustered in at Nashville and did post and garrison duty there until ordered to Bridgeport, Ala. In September 1863. Later he did guard duty on the Nashville & Northwestern Railroad until April 1865. He mustered out in East Tennessee on June 23, 1865. He is photographed as an elderly man probably after 1900.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pleasant Carroll Grayson
